channel.title: Posts on F#-ening
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on F#-ening

item.title: F#rst Post
item.description: This article made me learn my second language when I hadn’t even gained confidence in my first. And I ended up trying to use the new one more- slowing down both for awhile and affecting my CSC135 grade. By the time I touched my third, I ended up gaining more confidence on the first two; the fourth one had me cross pollinating patterns and practices. Languages that taught me newer ways to think, sported interesting “super powers”, or were just plain fun kept being used/enjoyed; others didn’t go beyond syntaxes.
